Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near Belmont/Campbell
ShortDescription: NB 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Belmont, Western, Roscoe, and Campbell due to, street blockage near Belmont/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Belmont, Western, Roscoe, and Campbell due to, street blockage near Belmont/Campbell.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed Howard
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Howard due to track conditions. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Howard due to track conditions. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. Shuttle buses are available between Howard and Belmont, in both directions, to provide connecting service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yello Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track conditions at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track conditions at Howard.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, such as the #97 Skokie or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
